languages.text: "То, что вы желаете во мне видеть — это изъян. Слабость, что сделала бы меня понятнее и проще. Но поверьте — вам не нужен такой человек в свите, как и Империум не нуждается в подобных слугах".

"What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."
languages.original_text: "То, что вы желаете во мне видеть — это изъян. Слабость, что сделала бы меня понятнее и проще. Но поверьте — вам не нужен такой человек в свите, как и Империум не нуждается в подобных слугах".

traits.locale_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw. A weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, and neither does the Imperium have use for such servants."

"What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

languages.text: 「あなたは私の中に欠点を見いだそうとしている——理解しやすく、扱いやすい単純な人間であることを示すような弱さを。ですが信じてください。あなたの護衛にそのような人間は必要ないし、帝国にもそのような奉仕者は求められていません」
languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私の中に欠点を見いだそうとしている——理解しやすく、扱いやすい単純な人間であることを示すような弱さを。ですが信じてください。あなたの護衛にそのような人間は必要ないし、帝国にもそのような奉仕者は求められていません」

languages.text: "Was Ihr in mir sehen wollt, ist ein Fehler – eine Schwäche, die mich simpler machen würde, leichter zu verstehen. Aber glaubt mir: So einen Mann könntet Ihr in Eurer Eskorte nicht gebrauchen, genauso wenig wie das Imperium solche Diener gebrauchen kann."
languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr in mir sehen wollt, ist ein Fehler – eine Schwäche, die mich simpler machen würde, leichter zu verstehen. Aber glaubt mir: So einen Mann könntet Ihr in Eurer Eskorte nicht gebrauchen, genauso wenig wie das Imperium solche Diener gebrauchen kann."

languages.text: « Vous voulez me trouver un défaut, une faiblesse qui fera de moi un homme moins complexe, plus simple à comprendre. Mais croyez-moi... vous n'avez pas besoin d'un tel homme au sein de votre escorte et l'Imperium n'a que faire de ce genre de serviteurs. »
languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez me trouver un défaut, une faiblesse qui fera de moi un homme moins complexe, plus simple à comprendre. Mais croyez-moi... vous n'avez pas besoin d'un tel homme au sein de votre escorte et l'Imperium n'a que faire de ce genre de serviteurs. »

languages.text: «Lo que pretende ver en mí es un defecto, una debilidad que me convierta en un hombre más simple, fácil de comprender. Pero hágame caso: no le conviene tener una persona así en su séquito, como tampoco el Imperium tiene necesidad de tales sirvientes».
languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que pretende ver en mí es un defecto, una debilidad que me convierta en un hombre más simple, fácil de comprender. Pero hágame caso: no le conviene tener una persona así en su séquito, como tampoco el Imperium tiene necesidad de tales sirvientes».

languages.text: “你希望能在我身上看到缺陷，你希望这个弱点能让我变得更简单、更容易理解。不过，请相信我，你不会想让这样的人来守护你的安全，帝国也同样不需要这样的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

traits.locale_text: “你希望能在我身上看到缺陷，你希望这个弱点能让我变得更简单、更容易理解。不过，请相信我，你不会想让这样的人来守护你的安全，帝国也同样不需要这样的仆人。”

languages.text: "Bende bir kusur görmek istiyorsunuz. Bakış açınızdan beni daha basit ve anlaşılması daha kolay bir adam yapacak bir zayıflık arıyorsunuz. Ancak inanın bana... Ne sizin böyle bir refakatçiye ne de İmparatorluk'un böyle bir hizmetkâra ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."

traits.locale_text: "Bende bir kusur görmek istiyorsunuz. Bakış açınızdan beni daha basit ve anlaşılması daha kolay bir adam yapacak bir zayıflık arıyorsunuz. Ancak inanın bana. Ne sizin böyle bir refakatçiye ne de İmparatorluk'un böyle bir hizmetkâra ihtiyacı var."

languages.original_text: "What you want to see in me is a flaw — a weakness that would make me a simpler man, easier to understand. But trust me: you don't need a man like that in your escort, nor does the Imperium have use for such servants."
